channel.title: hse on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in hse on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: Anomaly Prediction
item.description: TL; DR Application of Neural Networks, Machine Learning algorithms, Reinforcement Learning and Natural Language Processing for Detection / Prediction of Anomalies in Storage Area Network by log data. Also, development and testing researched methods for improving Digital Twin of Storage Area Network, methods on chaotic systems, OpenAI Gym wrappers. Research Article in process (~2021) Research Article “SANgo: a storage infrastructure simulator with reinforcement learning support” (2020) Experiments and intermediate results Photo by Denny Müller on Unsplash

item.title: Space Navigator
item.description: TL; DR We made Space Navigator - a system for automatically determining the probability of collision of space objects and calculating the most effective evasive maneuver using AI. Stage of the project: Research Article “Space Navigator: a Tool for the Optimization of Collision Avoidance Maneuvers” (2020) MVP (2019) First place in the competition of projects of the Academy of Roscosmos (presentation slides, 2018) VR presentation (2018) Demonstrations and reports:

item.title: SMILES – The Summer School of Machine Learning at Skoltech
item.description: Participated in the international summer school SMILES – The Summer School of Machine Learning at Skoltech from 16 to 21 August 2020. In the poster session, I talked about two “AI & Satellite Problems” projects that we were engaged at the Laboratory of Methods for Big Data Analysis at the National Research University Higher School of Economics. Below is the submitted poster and the certificate provide. Poster PDF Certificate PDF Post about Data Analysis for Satellite Tracking
